footerBar.contactInstructions: For reservations or any inquiries, please feel free to contact us:

contactPage.aboutText: Welcome to Mexican Kitchen, your destination for authentic Mexican cuisine and a vibrant dining experience. Located in the heart of Houston, our restaurant is dedicated to bringing the rich flavors, vibrant colors, and warm hospitality of Mexico to your table. At Mexican Kitchen, we believe in the power of food to create connections and celebrate culture. Our team of talented chefs combines traditional Mexican recipes with innovative techniques to present you with a truly memorable culinary experience. From street tacos to enchiladas, our menu is a carefully curated selection of iconic dishes from various regions of Mexico, each prepared with love and attention to detail. Step inside our restaurant, and you'll be transported to a lively and welcoming atmosphere that captures the essence of Mexican hospitality. Our vibrant decor, inspired by the vibrant streets of Mexico, creates an inviting ambiance for you to enjoy your dining experience with family and friends. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply craving a delicious meal, our team is here to ensure that every visit to Mexican Kitchen is an unforgettable one. We take pride in sourcing the finest ingredients, ensuring that each dish is made with fresh, high-quality produce, authentic spices, and traditional cooking techniques. From savoring the flavors of our sizzling fajitas to indulging in our homemade guacamole, every bite will transport you to the heart of Mexico, awakening your taste buds and leaving you craving for more. At Mexican Kitchen, we strive to provide exceptional service, treating every guest like family. Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is always ready to assist you in selecting the perfect dish or suggesting a refreshing margarita to complement your meal. We are dedicated to creating an atmosphere where laughter, joy, and unforgettable moments are shared, making every visit a cherished memory. Whether you're a Mexican cuisine aficionado or looking to embark on a culinary adventure, we invite you to join us at Mexican Kitchen. Experience the passion, the flavors, and the spirit of Mexico as we take you on a gastronomic journey like no other. Come and be part of our extended family as we celebrate the rich tapestry of Mexican culture, one delicious plate at a time. ¡Bienvenidos a Mexican Kitchen! We can't wait to serve you and share the vibrant flavors of Mexico with you. ¡Buen provecho! (Enjoy your meal!)

appetizers.Name: Guacamole and Chips
appetizers.description: Delight in creamy guacamole paired with crispy tortilla chips for a satisfying appetizer

appetizers.Name: Queso Fundido
appetizers.description: Hot melted cheese and spicy chorizo that is often served flambé

appetizers.Name: Ceviche
appetizers.description: Marinated shrimp in citrus juices, combined with herbs and vegetables for a refreshing seafood experience

appetizers.Name: Taquitos
appetizers.description: Savory shredded chicken wrapped in crispy tortillas

appetizers.Name: Shrimp Cocktail
appetizers.description: Succulent shrimp, crisp lettuce, and tangy sauce.

appetizers.Name: Fajita Quesadilla
appetizers.description: Cheesy and loaded, the big fajita quesadilla is a flavor-packed sensation.

appetizers.Name: Chicken Jalapeño Nachos
appetizers.description: Nacho chips toped with grilled chicken, melted fiesta blend cheese, and jalapenos

soupsAndSalads.Name: Tortilla Soup
soupsAndSalads.description: Savory shredded chicken wrapped in crispy tortillas

soupsAndSalads.Name: Chicken Mexican Salad
soupsAndSalads.description: Grilled chicken, crisp lettuce, vibrant veggies, zesty dressing

soupsAndSalads.Name: Pozole
soupsAndSalads.description: Savor the flavors of Pozole: a hearty Mexican soup with tender pork, hominy, and aromatic spices

tacos.Name: Carne Asada Tacos
tacos.description: Grilled steak in warm tortillas with fresh toppings

tacos.Name: Al Pastor Tacos
tacos.description: Marinated pork, warm tortillas, vibrant toppings

tacos.Name: Baja Fish Tacos
tacos.description: Crispy fish fillets, nestled in warm tortillas, topped with fresh ingredients

tacos.Name: Vegetarian Tacos
tacos.description: Fresh veggies, savory beans, zesty toppings in warm tortillas

enchiladas.Name: Chicken Enchiladas
enchiladas.description: Tender chicken wrapped in tortillas, smothered with flavorful sauce and melted cheese

enchiladas.Name: Cheese and Spinach Enchiladas
enchiladas.description: Creamy cheese, flavorful spinach, tortillas, savory sauce

enchiladas.Name: Enchiladas Suizas
enchiladas.description: Rolled tortillas filled with savory chicken, smothered in creamy Swiss cheese sauce

desserts.Name: Churros
desserts.description: Crispy fried dough pastry, dusted with cinnamon sugar

desserts.Name: Tres Leches Cake
desserts.description: Ultra light cake soaked in a sweet milk mixture

beverages.Name: Margaritas
beverages.description: A refreshing blend of tequila, lime juice, and a touch of sweetness, served with a salted rim for a perfect balance of flavors

beverages.Name: Agua Frescas
beverages.description: Refreshing and fruity beverages made with fresh ingredients like watermelon, cucumber, or hibiscus, offering a cool and revitalizing sip

beverages.Name: Mexican Beer
beverages.description: Crisp and flavorful brews with a touch of zest and a hint of tradition
